'''''Sandstorm at the Well''''' is a song composed by [[Bear McCreary]] for the [[Where the Stars are Strange|second episode]] of the second season of ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Rings of Power]]''. It features lyrics sung in [[Rhûnnic]] by [[The Mystery of the Bulgarian Voices]]. According to Bear McCreary, the language the lyrics were sung in was crafted from some of [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]'s unpublished notes which some Tolkien scholars had unearthed.<ref>[https://bearmccreary.com/the-lord-of-the-rings-episode-202/ The Lord of the Rings: Episode 202], by [[Bear McCreary]], oct. 15, 2024.</ref>

==Poem==
<poem>
''I lurg i bauvailun, j'aišäd i raibo,''
</poem>

==Translation==
The [[Rhûnnic]] text above along with its following translation were published by Amazon's composer Bear McCreary on his personal website.<ref>[https://bearmccreary.com/the-lord-of-the-rings-episode-202/ The Lord of the Rings: Episode 202], by [[Bear McCreary]], oct. 15, 2024.</ref>
<poem>
''The threat unseen, the shrine at the border.''
</poem>

Only the first line was revealed on McCreary's blog.
